A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not what I expected at all! Which is why I give it 4.5 stars. What a fresh take on the Skywalker saga. TFA was a reboot of ANH... and I loved that too but I walked away feeling as though I’ve already experienced that kind of movie. With TLJ\, I can assure you\, it’s unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Really looking forward to Episode IX. As you can see\, the reviews are split\, the new direction is not for everyone. But personally\, I loved it!!!
